hypothesis_content.title: Altcoin Decoupling During BTC Consolidation
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC enters a low-volatility consolidation phase (daily ATR < 1.5% for 3+ days) while the overall market regime is NEUTRAL, select altcoins with strong recent fundamentals (positive news/social sentiment) will decouple and outperform BTC by 8%+ over the following 5 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: During neutral regimes with BTC consolidation, capital rotates to altcoins with catalysts. Low BTC volatility reduces systemic risk while allowing idiosyncratic alpha to emerge. The sentiment filter ensures we're not catching falling knives.
entry_conditions: Target altcoin (e.g., SOL, AVAX) has positive sentiment score > 0.3 (7-day avg)
Altcoin/BTC ratio 20-day MA is above 50-day MA (showing relative strength)
Enter on close when all conditions met

exit_conditions.take_profit: Altcoin/BTC ratio increases by 8% from entry
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Altcoin/BTC ratio decreases by 4% from entry

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: More than 60% of trades result in stop-loss being hit before take-profit or time exit, or average return is negative across 20+ instances.
